name: Cyrcles
description:
**ALPHA VERSION**

Cyrcles is a top down mouse only defence game where you kill the reds to protect your circle,

There will be many updates and features coming for this game, such as:

*Leaderboards
*Styles(aka if smooth or pixelated)
*Customisable characters
and *Other screen resolutions (16:9 is the only supported ratio right now)

And that's just naming some of them

Tutorial
Choppy: Left click to move

Smooth: Left click hold to move

Kill the reds before they reach your circle
Make sure the walls also don't hit the circle, or else it's a game over!
